alert.note: Alert for Reno; Rice (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 07 at 1:41PM CDT until June 09 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kansas... Cow Creek near Hutchinson affecting Rice and Reno Counties. For the Cow Creek...including Hutchinson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON TO LATE THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cow Creek near Hutchinson. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon to late Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, the low water crossing on Wilson Rd between 69th Ave to 82nd Ave floods. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 6.6 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 10.1 feet early Thursday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 9.5 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Cow Creek Hutchinso 9.5 6.6 Tue 1 pm CDT 9.5 9.2 6.1 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
